item.description:
Watch the Red Sox's playoff game on our 12' x 12' Large Screen TV

NEW DANCE DATES & WOMEN PAY ONLY $15
You asked for Friday and Saturday dances...
You asked for lowers prices for the ladies...
You asked for meatballs...
So now, let me ask you, are you ready to party?

FRIDAY, October 9 -
7:30 Dance Class with Rob Michaud
8:00 - 12:00 PM Singles Dance
Theme: Colors of Fall...please wear something red, orange or yellow.

This is our first Friday dance and we are very excited about it. Sundays were very tough for many of our dancers who had go too work on Monday. Spread the word and bring a friend.

Dance in the grand ballroom or socialize and cool off on the romantic and picturesque patio on the 1st tee overlooking the golf course. Delicious chef-prepared hors d'oeuvres, tasty veggie platters and dessert for your sweet tooth, along with free coffee. The cash bar will have a variety of beer, mixed drinks and wine, soda & bottled water.

Now that summer is over the dress is back to "Business" attire. Men must wear sport jackets, collared shirts. Women...you know what to wear! We'll have a rocking' DJ playing all your favorite oldies, the best of today's dance songs and any request you may have.

Admission Men/$20 Women/$15.
You can pay cash at the door.

Please sign up for all North of 40 Singles Dances via our websites
http://www.northof40s...
http://www.meetup.com...

See you soon!

Rick Pierro
North of 40 Singles
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be greeting you at the door.
item.name: Friday/Singles Dance/12' large screen TV to watch Red Sox playoffs
